title: Abtract submision
text: Please submit abstracts for contributed talks or poster presentation using this form by 1st March 2025. Abstracts should be a maximum of 250 words.

title: Contact
text: For any enquires, please contact Daniela Castro-Camilo at daniela.castrocamilo@glasgow.ac.uk.

title: INLA: past, present, and future
text:
The second edition of the workshop INLA: Past, Present, and Future will be held in honour of Haavard Rueâ€™s 60th birthday.
The event will take place 21-23 May 2025 in the University of Glasgow and is generously sponsored by the Glasgow Mathematical Journal Trust.
The workshop is free of charge, but registration is required due to limited capacity. Students and early career researchers are encouraged to participate.









Organisers: Daniela Castro-Camilo, Sara Martino, and Janine Illian

title: Registration
text: The workshop is free of charge, but registration is mandatory due to limited capacity. Please register to attend the workshop using this form.
